predicate.note: Frames file for 'infuse' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to fill with something or put into

example.name: infuse with
example.text: If that attitude lasts , it could infuse covert action planning with a level of care and confidence that [*T*-2] has n't been seen [*-1] in years .
example.arg: a level of care and confidence that [*T*-2] has n't been seen [*-1] in years

example.name: infuse into
example.text: Delmed did say that the proposal still would infuse cash into Delmed but less than the $ 10 million [*U*] originally expected [*] .
